member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.PollingFileChangeToken
member.summary: A change token that polls for file system changes.

remarks.para: This change token does not raise any change callbacks. Callers should watch for to turn from to and dispose the token after this happens.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of that polls the specified file for changes as determined by .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.PollingFileChangeToken.HasChanged
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the file has changed since the change token was created.
member.remarks: Once the file changes, this value is always . Change tokens should not reused once expired. The caller should discard this instance once it sees is true.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.PollingFileChangeToken.RegisterChangeCallback(System.Action{System.Object},System.Object)
member.summary: Does not actually register callbacks.
member.returns: A disposable object that no-ops when disposed.

member.summary: Looks up files using the on-disk file system.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a PhysicalFileProvider at the given root directory.

Specifies which files or directories are excluded.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProvider.UsePollingFileWatcher
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines if this instance of uses polling to determine file changes.
member.value: The default value of this property is determined by the value of environment variable named DOTNET_USE_POLLING_FILE_WATCHER. When or 1, this property defaults to ; otherwise .
member.remarks: By default, uses to listen to file change events for . is ineffective in some scenarios such as mounted drives. Polling is required to effectively watch for file changes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProvider.UseActivePolling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines if this instance of actively polls for file changes.
member.value: if the returned by actively polls for file changes ( will be ) instead of being passive. The default value of this property is determined by the value of environment variable named DOTNET_USE_POLLING_FILE_WATCHER. When or 1, this property defaults to ; otherwise .

remarks.para: This property is only effective when is set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProvider.GetDirectoryContents(System.String)
member.summary: Enumerates a directory at the given path, if any.
member.param: A path under the root directory. Leading slashes are ignored.

remarks.para: The caller must check the property.
Returns if is absolute, if the directory does not exist, or has invalid characters.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProvider.Watch(System.String)
member.param: Filter string used to determine what files or folders to monitor. Example: **/*.cs, *.*, subFolder/**/*.cshtml.
member.returns: An that is notified when a file matching is added, modified, or deleted. Returns a if has invalid filter characters or if is an absolute path or outside the root directory specified in the constructor .
